title: Season 4 map
body:
Hello!
Is anybody here that knows how can i play on season 4 map? Not especially season 4 but the old one before season 5. I tried every custom skin that I found but i guess custom skins doesn't work anymore. Anyway not with the old geometry. So if there is anybody that can help me please tell me.
Thank you!

replies.body:
Here's how you play on the season 4 map:

1) Invent a time machine.
2) Travel back to 2014.
3) ????
4) Profit.

I say bring back simplicity, and skill. If that involves the season 4 map, then so be it. Actually many people a few years back said "oh get used to the new map, you'll forget all about the old one" but nope, i enjoyed the season 4 graphics better. Simpler, fast, with less disconnects.
The old map was an outright eyesore, not to mention the terrible inconsistencies with geometry which caused issues with Blink type spells and warding.
